name: Yasuo
title: the Unforgiven
q_displayname: Steel Tempest / Steel Tempest 2 / Steel Tempest 3

i1.blurb: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
description: {{sbc|Intent:}} '''Yasuo''' doubles his {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} from all other sources, but his {{sti|critical strike damage|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|80|90}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Resolve:}} '''Yasuo''' generates {{tip|Flow}} for every {{pp|3|59 to 46|1 to 13}} units he travels by any means. At {{ft|100 stacks|{{pp|3|59*100 to 46*100|1 to 13}} units traveled}} and upon taking [[champion]] or [[monster]] damage, '''Yasuo''' consumes {{tip|Flow|all Flow}} to {{tip|shield}} himself for {{pp|18|100|105|110|115|120|130|140|150|165|180|200|225|255|290|330|380|440|510}} for up to 1 second.
i1.name: Way of the Wanderer
notes: * {{iis|Statikk Shiv}} critical strike is also affected by ''Intent'' damage reduction, dealing a total of {{as|{{pp|108;108;108;108;ceil (60+80/13*(x-1))*2*0.9|round=ceil|formula = base*2*0.9}} magic damage}}.

q1.blurb: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
description: {{sbc|First Cast - Steel Tempest:}} After a {{as|{{pp|9|type='''bonus''' attack speed|round=3|0.4 to 0.148;2/15|key1=%|0 to 105;1000/9|formula=0.4*(1-(0.01 per 1.67% '''bonus''' attack speed)). ''This is capped at 67% reduction at 111.1% '''bonus''' attack speed.''}}|attack speed}} second-delay, '''Yasuo''' thrusts his sword to deal {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in the target direction, applying [[on-hit effect]]s to the first target hit. Casting ''Steel Tempest'' while dashing with ''{{ai|Sweeping Blade}}'' will instead affects enemies around '''Yasuo''' at the end of the dash.
''Steel Tempest'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|60|80}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Steel Tempest'' hits an enemy, he gains a ''Gathering Storm'' stack for 6 seconds to which he's able to cast ''Steel Wind Rising''.
{{sbc|Second Cast - Steel Wind Rising:}} '''Yasuo''' casts ''Steel Tempest''. If it hits an enemy, '''Yasuo''' can gain another ''Gathering Storm'' stack to which he can cast ''Gathering Storm''.

{{sbc|Third Cast - Gathering Storm:}} '''Yasuo''' unleashes a whirlwind that travels in the target direction, dealing the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit. The whirlwind is not released when cast during ''{{ai|Sweeping Blade}}'', but '''Gathering Storm''' still gains the {{tip|airborne|knock up}}.
q1.name: Steel Tempest
notes: * ''Steel Tempest'' counts as single-target for the first enemy hit and [[area of effect]] for the others.
** {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} will only heal from the damage dealt to secondary targets.

* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Steel Tempest'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yasuo''' still gets a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind knockup cannot be blocked:
** {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax}}: both first target and secondary target '''do not''' deal damage.
** {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} and {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}}: first target '''does not''' deal damage, secondary target '''does''' deal damage.
** {{ai|Blinding Dart|Teemo}}: both first target and secondary target '''do''' deal damage.
* ''Steel Tempest'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
* ''Steel Tempest's'' damage is calculated individually for every enemy hit when {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}}.
* ''Steel Tempest'' is not considered a basic attack for effects like {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} and stacking {{tip|Energized|Energizing}} attacks.
* Unlike other abilities, the first two ''Steel Tempests'' will cancel and reset their cooldown if '''Yasuo''' is {{tip|stun|stunned}} during their cast time.
** The third ''Steel Tempest'' will continue its cast through the stun.
** If '''Yasuo''' however buffers ''Steel Tempest'' after {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}, a stun will cause ''Steel Tempest'' to cancel and go on full cooldown.
q1.static: {{as|{{pp|9|type='''bonus''' attack speed|4 to 1.48;4/3|key1=%|0 to 105;1000/9|formula=4*(1-(0.01 per 1.67% '''bonus''' attack speed)). ''This is capped at 67% reduction at 111.1% '''bonus''' attack speed.''}}|attack speed}}

w1.blurb: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over {{tt|{{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}} to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward 50 units over {{fd|3.75}} seconds, blocking all enemy [[projectile]]s except {{tip|turret}} attacks.
w1.name: Wind Wall
notes: * ''Wind Wall'' starts blocking projectiles on-cast (despite not being fully formed) and grants {{tip|sight}} over a small area.

e1.blurb: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance toward a target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
Each ''Sweeping Blade'' cast increases the next dash's '''base''' damage by 25% for 5 seconds, up to 50%.
'''Yasuo''' cannot dash to the same target more than once every few seconds.
e1.name: Sweeping Blade
notes: * ''Sweeping Blade's'' dash speed is affected by {{tip|slow|slows}}, and '''Yasuo''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control.
* ''Sweeping Blade'' will generate {{tt|{{fd|7.5}}|If he dashes the maximum distance}} {{tip|Flow}} stacks per cast.
* ''Yasuo'' can use ''Sweeping Blade's'' fixed dash distance to cross walls both before and after hitting his target (provided his proximity to the wall and/or target allows it).

r1.blurb: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|blinks}} to the other side of a {{tip|sight|visible}} {{tip|airborne}} enemy champion nearest to the cursor, instantly generating {{tip|Flow|100 Flow}} while resetting ''{{ais|Steel Tempest}}'' stacks.
Upon arrival, he {{tip|suspension|suspends}} all nearby {{tip|airborne}} enemies around the target for 1 second, dealing {{as|physical damage}} thereafter.
For the next 15 seconds, '''Yasuo's''' {{tip|critical strikes}} gain {{sti|lethality|{{as|50% '''bonus''' armor penetration}}}}.
''If '''Yasuo''' would be placed inside a turret's attack range upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to [[Nexus Obelisk]]).''
r1.name: Last Breath
notes: * ''Last Breath's'' area of effect when suspending enemies increases per rank.
* ''Last Breath's'' damage and bonus armor penetration do not interact with each other.
* Suspended enemies are immune to further displacements during ''Last Breath's'' animation time.
** Casting right after the triggering displacement(s) will overwrite the latter's duration (whether shorter/longer) to ''Last Breath's'' animation time (durations will not stack).
* The targets will remain suspended and the damage will be applied even if '''Yasuo''' dies during it.
* Many displacement abilities that affect enemy champions are considered {{tip|Airborne}}, and will therefore interact with ''Last Breath''.
** Self-applied displacements cannot be targeted by ''Last Breath'':
** Enemies displaced by neutral monsters (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock-back) can be targeted.
** Enemies displaced by their allies (e.g {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) can be targeted.
